publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6841Murdo Fraser:Perth 10km Race 2010—That the Parliament welcomes this year’s Perth 10 km Race, scheduled to take place in Perth city on Sunday 29 August 2010; notes the proud and long history of the race and thanks all the organisers involved for their hard work and dedication to put on this event, including Perth Road Runners and Strathtay Harriers, and wishes all runners well in their challenge.
S3M-6841 Perth 10km Race 2010 (lodged on 19 August 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
